thread.title: A nun stands in St Peter's Square as Pope Francis is hospitalised for bronchitis and missed his weekly Angelus prayer
thread.title_full: A nun stands in St Peter's Square as Pope Francis is hospitalised for bronchitis and missed his weekly Angelus prayer

author: Filippo MONTEFORTE
title: A nun stands in St Peter's Square as Pope Francis is hospitalised for bronchitis and missed his weekly Angelus prayer
text:
A nun stands in St Peter's Square as Pope Francis is hospitalised for bronchitis and missed his weekly Angelus prayer Filippo MONTEFORTE Feb 16, 2025 Feb 16, 2025 Updated 7 mins ago 0 Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save A nun stands in St Peter's Square as Pope Francis is hospitalised for bronchitis and missed his weekly Angelus prayer Filippo MONTEFORTE Tags Partners/afp Faith Vatican Pope Health As featured on +3 Vatican says 'stable' Pope Francis watched Sunday mass on hospital TV Pope Francis followed Sunday mass and his traditional Angelus weekly prayer on television in a Rome hospital where the 88-year-old pontiff is being treated for bronchitis.
